tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    item_id UUID
);
CREATE TABLE UserBehaviorLogs ( user_id INT, behavior_type VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, timestamp) );
CREATE TABLE UserProfiles ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE ProductInteractions ( product_id INT, user_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (product_id, user_id, timestamp) );
CREATE TABLE RecommendationsHistory ( user_id INT, recommended_product_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, timestamp) );

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL(2,1),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recommended_item_id INT,
    score DECIMAL(5,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
